snippet.title: Match Three Pirates! Heir to Davy Jones - Release Trailer | Steam
snippet.description:
Enter a magic world of pirate adventure and find out if you can escape the curse of Davy Jones’ Locker!

Beautiful hand-drawn graphics
The thoroughly elaborated pirate atmosphere of Davy Jones’ Locker. This world only seems cartoon…
An interesting plot, talking dialogs, and exciting cutscenes
the pirates - characters with their own destiny and story
Beat all 100 difficult and moves-limited levels to save Bobby
Unique gameplay features
Unusual boosters
Pirate Roulette
Customize ship and raise black flag under you own the pirate's Vessel!
Incredible enemies - Monkey-hooligan, Gull-thief and others what will try to stop you!
Shanty and real sea soundtrack
Currently, 15 achievements waiting to be unlocked

For more information about the game please visit our official website: http://graphiumstudios.com/
